Summary: We were driving on a country when my husband pointed out something strange in thenight sky. At first we thought it was a comet or meteor but it streaked across the sky horizontally. We could see many colors coming from it and then disappeared quickly.
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were coming back from dinner at a local restaurant heading back to our hotel. It was dark. My husband first noticed something in the sky not too high up and pointed it out to me. It was very bright and from where we were looked like nothing I have every seen before. It seemed to have a tail and the appeared multicolored. The area we were in was very rural. Unfortunetly we do not remember what road we were on because we were using our GPS to get us back to the hotel in Manheim, Pa. At first we thought it was a shooting star or comet. But it was too large and bright. It suddenly disappeared as quickly as it appeared. We realized that we had seen something unusual and that it was not a comet or shooting star.
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Manheim
There were no other sightings in Manheim on or around December 6th 2008
